Title: Improper Input Validation
Description: Forms secured by `SecurityComponent` could be submitted to any action without triggering SecurityComponents tampering protection.
AffectedVersions: All versions starting from 1.3.0 before 1.3.18, all versions starting from 2.0.0 before 2.4.8,
NotImpacted: All versions before 1.3.0, all versions starting from 1.3.18 all versions before 2.0.0, all versions starting from 2.4.8
